events.title: Minalcar becomes Regent
events.description: King Narmacil I of Gondor, to rid himself of his cares, appoints his nephew Minalcar (later known as Rómendacil II) Regent of Gondor. Minalcar rules as Regent, in the name of King, until he succeeds his father as King himself in T.A. 1304

events.title: Last White Council
events.description: Last meeting of the White Council. They debate the Rings of Power. Saruman feigns that he has discovered that the One Ring has passed down Anduin to the Sea. Saruman withdraws to Isengard, which he takes as his own, and fortifies it. Being jealous and afraid of Gandalf he sets spies to watch all his movements; and notes his interest in the Shire. He soon begins to keep agents in Bree and the Southfarthing

events.title: Ferumbras Took III
events.description: Death of Thain Ferumbras Took III.

events.title: Paladin Took II becomes Thain
events.description: Paladin Took II, son of Adalgrim Took son of Hildigrim Took, brother of Ferumbras, becomes the thirty-first Thain of the Shire

events.title: Gollum leaves Mordor
events.description: Gollum is released from Mordor. He is taken by Aragorn in the Dead Marshes, and brought to Thranduil in Mirkwood

events.title: Gandalf to Minas Tirith
events.description: Gandalf visits Minas Tirith and reads the scroll of Isildur

events.title: Alphros
events.description: Birth of Alphros, son of Elphir, Prince of Dol Amroth.

events.title: Éomer becomes Third Marshal
events.description: Éomer becomes Third Marshal of the Riddermark

events.title: War of the Ring
events.description: War of the Ring

events.title: Aragorn captures Gollum
events.description: Aragorn captures Gollum

events.title: Aragorn to Thranduil
events.description: Aragorn reaches Thranduil with Gollum

events.title: Gandalf to Thranduil
events.description: Gandalf comes to Thranduil and questions Gollum

events.title: Gandalf to Hobbiton
events.description: Gandalf leaves Thranduil and heads west for Hobbiton

events.title: Gandalf reaches Hobbiton
events.description: Gandalf reaches Hobbiton

events.title: Frodo knows about the Ring
events.description: Gandalf reveals to Frodo that Bilbo's ring is the One Ring

events.title: Gandalf to Sarn Ford
events.description: Gandalf meets with Aragorn at Sarn Ford

events.title: Boromir and Faramir receive riddle
events.description: Boromir and Faramir receive the riddle in their sleep

events.title: Sauron attacks Osgiliath
events.description: Sauron attacks Osgiliath. About the same time Thranduil is attacked, and Gollum escapes

events.title: Gandalf leaves letter
events.description: Gandalf leaves a letter for Frodo with Barliman Butterbur

events.title: Black Riders search Ring
events.description: The Black Riders set forth to search for the One Ring. They pass northward across the Wold

events.title: Boromir leaves Minas Tirith
events.description: Boromir sets out from Minas Tirith

events.title: Gandalf imprisoned
events.description: Gandalf imprisoned in Orthanc

events.title: Gollum to Moria
events.description: All trace of Gollum is lost. It is thought that at about this time, being hunted both by the Elves and Sauron's servants, he took refuge in Moria; but when he had at last discovered the way to the West-gate he could not get out

events.title: Black Riders return to the Wold
events.description: Having failed to find the Shire, the Black Riders return to the Wold empty-handed; messengers from Sauron send them to Isengard

events.title: Gandalf escapes
events.description: Gandalf escapes from Orthanc in the early hours. The Black Riders cross the Fords of Isen

events.title: Gandalf to Edoras
events.description: Gandalf comes to Edoras as a beggar, and is refused admittance

events.title: Black Riders to Isengard
events.description: Gandalf gains entrance to Edoras. Théoden commands him to go: 'Take any horse, only be gone ere tomorrow is old!' The Black Riders come to Isengard

events.title: Gandalf meets Shadowfax
events.description: Gandalf meets Shadowfax, but the horse will not allow him to come near. He follows Shadowfax far over the fields.[2] The Black Riders encounter Gríma, who tells them of the location of the Shire

events.title: Black Riders to Sarn Ford
events.description: The Black Riders reach Sarn Ford at evening; they drive off the guard of Rangers. Gandalf overtakes Shadowfax

events.title: Four Riders to Shire
events.description: Four Riders enter the Shire before dawn. The others pursue the Rangers eastward, and then return to watch the Greenway. A Black Rider comes to Hobbiton at nightfall. Frodo leaves Bag End. Gandalf having tamed Shadowfax rides from Rohan

events.title: Gandalf crosses Isen
events.description: Gandalf crosses the Isen

events.title: Black Rider to Farmer Maggot
events.description: A Black Rider approaches Farmer Maggot in Bamfurlong but he is ousted. The Hobbits later reach him who guides them with his wagon until the Bucklebury Ferry. The evening they meet Merry and reach Crickhollow. Frodo reveals them his plans, already known

events.title: Frodo to Bombadil
events.description: The Old Forest. Frodo comes to Bombadil

events.title: Gandalf crosses Greyflood
events.description: Gandalf crosses Greyflood. Second night with Bombadil

events.title: Gandalf to Sarn Ford
events.description: The Hobbits captured by a Barrow-wight. Gandalf reaches Sarn Ford

events.title: Frodo reaches Bree
events.description: Frodo reaches Bree at night. Gandalf visits the Gaffer

events.title: Frodo leaves Bree
events.description: Crickhollow and the Inn at Bree are raided in the early hours. Frodo leaves Bree. Gandalf comes to Crickhollow, and reaches Bree at night

events.title: Gandalf leaves Bree
events.description: Gandalf leaves Bree

events.title: Gandalf attacked
events.description: Gandalf is attacked at night on Weathertop. Frodo in the Midgewater Marshes sees flashes of light from the battle

events.title: Gandalf escapes
events.description: Gandalf escapes to the north from Weathertop, followed by four Riders

events.title: Frodo attacked
events.description: The camp under Weathertop attacked at night Frodo wounded

events.title: Glorfindel leaves Rivendell
events.description: Glorfindel leaves Rivendell

events.title: Glorfindel drives the Riders off
events.description: Glorfindel drives the Riders off the Last Bridge

events.title: Frodo crosses Bridge
events.description: Frodo crosses the Bridge

events.title: Glorfindel finds Frodo
events.description: Glorfindel finds Frodo at dusk. Gandalf reaches Rivendell

events.title: Glorfindel escapes
events.description: Glorfindel escapes across the Ford of Bruinen.

events.title: Frodo recovers
events.description: Frodo recovers and wakes. Boromir arrives in Rivendell at night

events.title: Council of Elrond
events.description: Council of Elrond

events.title: Company chosen
events.description: The membership of the Company of the Ring is chosen

events.title: Company leaves Rivendell
events.description: The Company of the Ring leaves Rivendell at dusk

events.title: Company reach Hollin
events.description: The Company reach Hollin

events.title: Snow on Caradhras
events.description: Snow on Caradhras

events.title: More snow
events.description: More snow...

events.title: Company reaches Moria
events.description: Attack by Wolves in the early hours. The Company reaches the West-gate of Moria at nightfall. Gollum begins to trail the Ring-bearer

events.title: Night in Hall Twenty-one
events.description: Night in Hall Twenty-one

events.title: Gandalf falls
events.description: The Bridge of Khazad-dûm, and fall of Gandalf. The Company reaches Nimrodel late at night

events.title: Company to Caras Galadhon
events.description: The Company comes to Caras Galadhon at evening

events.title: Gandalf fighting Balrog
events.description: Gandalf pursues the Balrog to the peak of Zirakzigil

events.title: Balrog
events.description: He casts down the Balrog, and passes away. His body lies on the peak

events.title: Mirror of Galadriel
events.description: The Mirror of Galadriel. Gandalf returns to life, and lies in a trance

events.title: Leaving Lothlórien
events.description: Farewell to Lórien. Gollum in hiding on the west bank observes the departure

events.title: Gandalf to Lothlórien
events.description: Gwaihir bears Gandalf to Lórien

events.title: Boats are attacked
events.description: The boats are attacked at night near Sarn Gebir. Shadowfax returns to Edoras

events.title: Company passing Argonath
events.description: The Company pass the Argonath and camp at Parth Galen. First Battle of the Fords of Isen; Théodred son of Théoden slain

events.title: Fellowship breaking
events.description: Breaking of the Fellowship. Death of Boromir; his horn is heard in Minas Tirith. Meriadoc and Peregrin captured. Frodo and Samwise Gamgee enter the eastern Emyn Muil. Aragorn sets out in pursuit of the Orcs at evening. Éomer hears of the descent of the Orc-band from the Emyn Muil

events.title: Aragorn reaches west-cliff
events.description: Aragorn reaches the west-cliff at sunrise. Éomer against Théoden's orders sets out from Eastfold about midnight to pursue the Orcs

events.title: Éomer overtakes Orcs
events.description: Éomer overtakes the Orcs just outside Fangorn Forest

events.title: Merry and Pippin to Treebeard
events.description: Merry and Pippin escape and meet Treebeard. The Rohirrim attack at sunrise and destroy the Orcs. Frodo descends from the Emyn Muil and meets Gollum. Faramir sees the funeral boat of Boromir

events.title: Entmoot begins
events.description: Entmoot begins. Éomer returning to Edoras meets Aragorn

events.title: Faramir to Ithilien
events.description: Frodo begins the passage of the Dead Marshes at dawn. Entmoot continues. Aragorn meets Gandalf, and forgets to celebrate his 88th birthday. They set out for Edoras. Faramir leaves Minas Tirith on an errand to Ithilien.

events.title: Gandalf heals Théoden
events.description: Frodo comes to the end of the Dead Marshes. Gandalf comes to Edoras and heals Théoden. The Rohirrim ride west against Saruman. Second Battle of the Fords of Isen. Erkenbrand defeated. Entmoot ends in afternoon. The Ents march on Isengard and reach it at night

events.title: Battle of the Hornburg
events.description: Théoden retreats to Helm's Deep. Battle of the Hornburg begins. Ents complete the destruction of Isengard

events.title: Frodo reaches slag-mounds
events.description: Théoden and Gandalf set out from the Hornburg for Isengard. Frodo reaches the slag-mounds on the edge of the Desolation of the Morannon

events.title: Théoden to Isengard
events.description: Théoden reaches Isengard at noon. Parley with Saruman in Orthanc. Winged Nazgûl passes over the camp at Dol Baran. Gandalf sets out with Pippin for Minas Tirith. Frodo hides in sight of the Morannon, and leaves at dusk

events.title: Gandalf and Pippin to Edoras
events.description: At dawn Gandalf and Pippin reach Edoras. Aragorn overtaken by the Grey Company in the early hours. Aragorn uses the Orthanc-stone to reveal himself and Andúril to Sauron. Théoden sets out from the Hornburg for Harrowdale. Aragorn sets out later

events.title: Frodo taken by Faramir
events.description: Frodo taken by Faramir to Henneth Annûn. Aragorn comes to Dunharrow at nightfall. Gandalf and Pippin, riding through Anórien, see the Warning beacons of Gondor lit

events.title: Aragorn takes Paths of Dead
events.description: Aragorn takes the Paths of the Dead at daybreak; he reaches the Stone of Erech at midnight. Frodo leaves Henneth Annûn

events.title: Gandalf to Minas Tirith
events.description: Gandalf reaches Minas Tirith. Faramir leaves Henneth Annûn. Aragorn sets out from Erech and comes to Calembel. At dusk Frodo reaches the Morgul-road. Théoden comes to Dunharrow. The Red Arrow is presented by Hirgon to Théoden. Darkness begins to flow out of Mordor

events.title: Rohirrim ride from Harrowdale
events.description: The Dawnless Day. The Muster of Rohan: the Rohirrim ride from Harrowdale. Faramir rescued by Gandalf and Imrahil outside the gates of the City. Aragorn crosses Ringló. An army from the Morannon takes Cair Andros and passes into Anórien. Frodo passes the Cross-roads, and sees the Morgul-host set forth

events.title: Gollum nears Shelob
events.description: Gollum visits Shelob, but seeing Frodo asleep nearly repents. Denethor sends Faramir to Osgiliath. Aragorn reaches Linhir and crosses into Lebennin. Eastern Rohan is invaded from the north. First assault on Lórien

events.title: Frodo into Shelob's Lair
events.description: Gollum leads Frodo into Shelob's Lair. Faramir retreats to the Causeway Forts. Cair Andros falls. Théoden camps under Min-Rimmon. Aragorn drives the Southrons towards Pelargir. The Ents defeat the invaders of Rohan

events.title: Frodo captured
events.description: Frodo captured by the Orcs of Cirith Ungol. The Pelennor is over-run. Faramir is wounded. Aragorn reaches Pelargir and captures the fleet. Théoden in Drúadan Forest

events.title: Minas Tirith besieged
events.description: Samwise finds Frodo in the Tower. Minas Tirith is besieged. The Rohirrim led by the Woses come to the Grey Wood

events.title: Witch-king breaks Minas Tirith
events.description: In the early hours the Witch-king breaks the Gates of the City. Denethor burns himself on a pyre. The horns of the Rohirrim are heard at cockcrow. Battle of the Pelennor Fields. Théoden is slain. Aragorn raises the standard of Arwen. Frodo and Sam escape and begin their journey north along the Morgai. Battle under the trees in Mirkwood; Thranduil repels the forces of Dol Guldur. Second assault on Lórien

events.title: Debate of the commanders
events.description: Debate of the commanders. Frodo from the Morgai looks out over the camp to Mount Doom

events.title: Battle of Dale
events.description: Battle of Dale. King Brand and King Dáin Ironfoot fall. Many Dwarves and Men take refuge in Erebor and are besieged. Shagrat brings Frodo's cloak, mail-shirt, and sword to Barad-dûr, and is murdered

events.title: Frodo over-taken by Orcs
events.description: The Host of the West marches from Minas Tirith. Frodo comes in sight of the Isenmouthe; he is over-taken by Orcs on the road from Durthang to Udûn

events.title: Frodo and Samwise escape
events.description: The Host comes to Morgul Vale. Frodo and Samwise escape and begin their journey along the road to the Barad-dûr

events.title: Evil ambushes
events.description: A force of Orcs and Easterlings attempt to ambush lead companies of the Host.

events.title: The dreadful nightfall
events.description: The dreadful nightfall. Frodo and Samwise leave the road and turn south to Mount Doom. Third assault on Lórien

events.title: Host passes out of Ithilien
events.description: The Host passes out of Ithilien. Aragorn dismisses the faint-hearted. Frodo and Samwise cast away their arms and gear

events.title: Frodo and Samwise make last journey
events.description: Frodo and Samwise make their last journey to the feet of Mount Doom. The Host of the West camps in the Desolation of the Morannon

events.title: Ring destroyed
events.description: The Host is surrounded on the Slag-hills of Dagorlad. Frodo and Samwise reach the Sammath Naur. Gollum seizes the Ring and falls in the Cracks of Mount Doom. Downfall of Barad-dûr and passing of Sauron

events.title: Bard and Thorin drive enemy
events.description: Bard II and Thorin III drive the enemy from Dale

events.title: Celeborn crosses Anduin
events.description: Celeborn crosses Anduin, destruction of Dol Guldur begun

events.title: Celeborn and Thrandui meetl
events.description: Meeting of Celeborn and Thranduil

events.title: Ring-bearers honoured
events.description: The Ring-bearers are honoured on the Field of Cormallen

events.title: Coronation of King Elessar
events.description: Coronation of King Elessar, Elrond and Arwen set out from Rivendell

events.title: Éomer and Éowyn depart
events.description: Éomer and Éowyn depart from Rohan with Elrohir and Elladan

events.title: Elrond and Arwen to Lothlórien
events.description: Elrond and Arwen come to Lórien

events.title: Arwen escort leaves Lothlórien
events.description: The escort of Arwen leaves Lórien

events.title: Arwen to Edoras
events.description: The sons of Elrond meet the escort and bring Arwen to Edoras

events.title: Arwen escort to Gondor
events.description: The escort of Arwen sets out for Gondor

events.title: King Elessar finds sapling
events.description: King Elessar finds the sapling of the White Tree

events.title: Elessar and Arwen
events.description: Wedding of Elessar and Arwen

events.title: Frodo sail West
events.description: Arwen gives Frodo her place to sail into the West

events.title: Éomer to Minas Tirith
events.description: Éomer returns to Minas Tirith

events.title: Théoden escort sets out from Minas Tirith
events.description: The funeral escort of King Théoden sets out from Minas Tirith

events.title: Théoden escort to Edoras
events.description: The escort comes to Edoras

events.title: Théoden funeral
events.description: Funeral of Théoden

events.title: Guests leave
events.description: The guests take leave of King Éomer

events.title: Treebeard releases Saruman
events.description: Treebeard releases Saruman from Orthanc

events.title: The guests to Helm's Deep
events.description: The guests come to Helm's Deep

events.title: The guests to Isengard
events.description: The guests come to Isengard, they take leave of the King of the West at sunset

events.title: Saruman to Shire
events.description: The guests overtake Saruman; Saruman turns towards the Shire

events.title: The guests halt in Moria
events.description: The guests halt in the sight of the Mountains of Moria

events.title: Celeborn and Galadriel depart
events.description: Celeborn and Galadriel depart, the others set out for Rivendell

events.title: Saruman in Shire
events.description: The hundred and twenty-ninth birthday of Bilbo. Saruman comes to the Shire

events.title: Gandalf, Frodo, Sam, Merry and Pippin leave Rivendell
events.description: Gandalf, Frodo, Sam, Merry and Pippin leave Rivendell

events.title: They cross Ford of Bruinen
events.description: They cross the Ford of Bruinen; Frodo feels the first return of pain

events.title: They reach Bree
events.description: They reach Bree at nightfall

events.title: They leave Bree
events.description: They leave Bree. The "Travellers" come to the Brandywine Bridge at dark. Gandalf leaves to visit Bombadil

events.title: Hobbits are arrested
events.description: The four Hobbits are arrested at Frogmorton

events.title: Hobbits to Bywater
events.description: They come to Bywater and rouse the Shire-folk

events.title: Battle of Bywater
events.description: Battle of Bywater, and Passing of Saruman. End of the War of the Ring

events.title: Frodo taken ill
events.description: Frodo is taken ill (on the anniversary of his poisoning by Shelob)

events.title: Mallorn flowers
events.description: The mallorn flowers in the Party Field.

events.title: Lobelia Bracegirdle
events.description: Death of Lobelia Bracegirdle (Sackville-Baggins)

events.title: Samwise weds Rose
events.description: Samwise marries Rose

events.title: Frodo resigns mayor office
events.description: Frodo resigns office of mayor, and Will Whitfoot is restored

events.title: Bilbo's 13. birthday
events.description: Bilbo's hundred and thirtieth birthday

events.title: Frodo ill again
events.description: Frodo is again ill

events.title: Faramir weds Éowyn
events.description: Faramir weds Éowyn

events.title: Frodo ill again
events.description: Frodo is again ill

events.title: Last day of the Third Age
events.description: The last day of the Third Age, according to the reckoning of Gondor

events.title: Elanor
events.description: Sam's daughter Elanor is born. The beginning of the Fourth Age, according to the calendars of Gondor

events.title: Frodo and Sam leave Hobbiton
events.description: Frodo and Sam set out from Hobbiton for the Grey Havens

events.title: Frodo and Sam meet Last Riding
events.description: Frodo and Sam meet the Last Riding of the Keepers in Woody End

events.title: Departure of the Ring-bearers
events.description: Departure of the Ring-bearers for Valinor. This event is also said to mark the end of the Third Age

events.title: Sam to Bag End
events.description: Sam returns to Bag End on his faithful pony, Bill

events.title: Éomer weds Lothíriel
events.description: Éomer weds Lothíriel
